CYYZ.rawOb: CYYZ 101900Z 25012G18KT 15SM BKN038 M04/M12 A3036 RMK SC6 SLP294
CYYZ.weather_description: Good evening! Here’s the weather update for Toronto/Pearson Intl. We're currently seeing a chilly temperature of -4 °C with a relative humidity of 53.8%, which makes it feel even colder out there. The winds are fairly breezy, blowing at 22.2 km/h and gusting up to 33.3 km/h. So, if you’re heading out, make sure to bundle up and be prepared for those gusty winds. Stay warm!

OMDB.weather_description: Good evening, Dubai! Currently at Dubai International, we're enjoying a pleasant temperature of 20 °C with a relative humidity of 56.2%. The air feels comfortable, perfect for an evening out. Winds are gentle, blowing at 5.6 km/h, adding to the pleasant conditions. Overall, it’s a lovely night in the city, ideal for a stroll or outdoor activities. Stay tuned for more updates!

LTFM.rawOb: LTFM 101920Z 01011KT 9999 BKN025 02/M03 Q1029 NOSIG RMK RWY17L 36012KT RWY34L 35012KT RWY16R 35011KT RWY36 36012KT RWY18 01012KT
LTFM.weather_description: Good evening! Here's the latest weather update for Istanbul Airport. Currently, we're experiencing a chilly temperature of 2 °C with a relative humidity of 69.5%, making it feel quite crisp out there. It's advisable to bundle up if you're heading outside. The wind is whipping through at a speed of 20.4 km/h, so expect a bit of a breeze that might make it feel even colder. Overall, it’s a brisk, refreshing evening in Istanbul, perfect for a warm drink!

KLAX.weather_description: Good evening! Here's your weather update for Los Angeles International. Currently, the temperature is a cool 15.6 °C, with a relative humidity of 61.8%, making it feel quite pleasant outside. We've got a gentle breeze blowing in from the west at about 13.0 km/h. Overall, it's a lovely day to be outdoors, so if you have any plans, you should enjoy the nice weather!

WIII.rawOb: WIII 101930Z 30006KT 7000 VCTS FEW017CB BKN018 25/23 Q1010 NOSIG RMK CB TO NE
WIII.weather_description: Good evening! Today in Jakarta at Hatta International Airport, we are experiencing some stormy weather. The temperature is currently a warm 25 °C, and the air is quite humid, with a relative humidity of 88.7%. There’s a thunderstorm in the vicinity, so be cautious if you're heading out. Winds are picking up, blowing at speeds of 11.1 km/h. Be sure to keep an eye on your umbrellas, folks! Stay safe and dry!
